whisper-dandere.name: Whisper Dandere
whisper-dandere.text: Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent Support cards while Neutral. Dere: Gain +2 shield counters. Extreme: When you speak (play a Support), draw a card.
whisper-dandere.flavor: When she finally speaks up, the whole battlefield listens.

sunbeam-deredere.name: Sunbeam Deredere
sunbeam-deredere.text: Start of Turn: Give bonded allies +1 {BOND}. Activated: Spend 1 {BOND} to heal 2 Affection to another waifu. Extreme: Your bonded allies gain +1 Affection when they attack.
sunbeam-deredere.flavor: A beam of sunshine with emergency snacks for everyone.

crown-himedere.name: Crown Himedere
crown-himedere.text: Leader Aura: Other allied waifus gain +1 ATK while you have the highest Affection. Dere: Your Support cards cost 1 less. Extreme: When you defeat a waifu, gain +2 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection.
crown-himedere.flavor: Bow properly and victory is yours to command.

domination-kamidere.name: Domination Kamidere
domination-kamidere.text: Command Phase: Spend 2 {BOND} to choose an enemy waifu; it must attack a target you pick this turn. Dere: Opponents can't ready more than one waifu during End Phase. Extreme: When you issue a command, ready one of your waifus.
domination-kamidere.flavor: Kneel now and the world might spare you.

icebound-kuudere.name: Icebound Kuudere
icebound-kuudere.text: Reaction: When an opponent plays a Support, spend 1 {BOND} to cancel it. Dere: Opponents cannot gain bonus bonds outside their turn. Extreme: First trap each turn resets to face-down after resolving.

flame-tsundere.name: Flame Tsundere
flame-tsundere.text: On Summon: Deal 1 damage to a target waifu. Extreme: +2 damage on first attack each turn.
flame-tsundere.flavor: It's NOT like she wanted to melt your defenses... idiot!

crimson-yandere.name: Crimson Yandere
crimson-yandere.text: On Summon: Mark a rival waifu. Activated: Spend 2 {BOND} to deal 3 damage to the marked target. Extreme: When the mark is cleared, gain +3 bonds.
crimson-yandere.flavor: Love can be a double-edged blade. Mostly edge.

fracture-yangire.name: Fracture Yangire
fracture-yangire.text: When you attack: Flip a coin. Heads — deal +4 damage. Tails — take 2 self-damage. Dere: Gain +1 {BOND} on heads. Extreme: You may flip twice and choose the result, but suffer both tails outcomes.
fracture-yangire.flavor: Sanity is a courtesy, not a promise.

bond-promise.name: Bond Promise
bond-promise.text: Choose a waifu. Gain +2 Bonds on that waifu. If that waifu is in Dere or higher, draw a card.

reversal-strike.name: Reversal Strike
reversal-strike.text: Trap Trigger: When an opponent declares an attack, prevent 2 damage and deal 1 damage to the attacker. If your defending waifu is Extreme, deal 2 instead.
reversal-strike.flavor: Tension flips momentum faster than you can say 'baka'.
